name: ibus-setup
body:
IBUS-SETUP

NAME

ibus-setup - configuration program for ibus

SYNOPSIS

ibus-setup

DESCRIPTION

IBus is an Intelligent Input Bus. It is a new input framework for Linux OS. It provides full featured and user friendly input method user interface. It also may help developers to develop input method easily.

ibus-setup is the configuration program for IBus.

Homepage: https://github.com/ibus/ibus/wiki

ADVANCED

Use system keyboard layout

If this option is enabled, use your system keymap instead and IBus does not change it with any input method engines. The system keymap is decided by your desktop session. IBus calls setxkbmap (1) command internally to set the selected keymap and override the system keymap if this options is disabled. You can check the current keymap with setxkbmap -query command.

Share the same input method among all applications

If this option is disabled, You can choose an input metod engine by input context.

BUGS

If you find a bug, please report it at https://github.com/ibus/ibus/issues

SEE ALSO

ibus(1)
